DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH
DOC.TEXT: European Union ' s Unemployment_Rate Rises : The jobless figure rose to 10.9 % in January from a revised 10.8 % in December and 10.0 % a year earlier , the EU ' s statistical office said . Eurostat expects unemployment to keep rising this year because economic_growth will be too feeble to offset an increase in the number of job-seekers and companies further pruning back their work_force . The largest increases in unemployment during the last year were in Spain ( 22.9 % from 20.3 % ) and the_Netherlands ( 10.0 % from 8.0 % ) .
